mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance ( user_id, status, date, start_time, end_time, remarks ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{status}, #{date}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE attendance SET status = #{status}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE attendance_id = #{attendanceId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO monthly_attendance_req ( user_id, target_year_month, date, status ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{targetYearMonth}, #{date}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE monthly_attendance_req SET id = #{id}, user_id = #{userId}, target_year_month = #{targetYearMonth}, date = #{date}, status = #{status}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.user_id, t1.target_year_month, t1.date, t1.status, t2.name FROM monthly_attendance_req t1 INNER JOIN users t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.user_id WHERE t1.status = 1;
